prerequisites_missing.title: Voice Assistant Setup Required
prerequisites_missing.description:
This integration requires a voice assistant to be configured.

**Status:**
- Speech-to-Text: {stt_status} ({stt_provider})
- Assist Pipeline: {assist_status} ({pipeline_count} pipelines)

**Missing:** {missing_items}

**To set up voice assistant:**
1. Install Wyoming Whisper add-on (Settings → Add-ons)
2. Configure Whisper integration (Settings → Integrations)
3. Create an Assist pipeline (Settings → Voice Assistants)

You can continue anyway, but voice commands won't work until this is configured.

kodi.title: Connect to Kodi
kodi.description: Enter your Kodi connection details. Window ID {window_id_help}.

addon_missing.title: Kodi Addon Not Found
addon_missing.description:
The script.openwindow addon is required but not installed on Kodi.

Would you like to automatically install it via SSH? This works with CoreELEC/LibreELEC.

ssh_install.title: SSH Auto-Install
ssh_install.description: Enter SSH credentials for your Kodi device. For CoreELEC/LibreELEC, the default is root with no password.

addon_confirm.title: Manual Installation Required
addon_confirm.description:
Please install the script.openwindow addon manually. See the documentation for installation instructions.

Voice search will not work until the addon is installed.

Click Submit to continue anyway.

install_success.title: Setup Complete
install_success.description:
The script.openwindow addon has been installed, Kodi has been restarted, and the addon is now active.

You can now use voice commands to search Kodi!

restart_failed.title: Could Not Restart Kodi
restart_failed.description:
The addon was installed but we couldn't restart Kodi automatically.

Please restart Kodi manually:
```
systemctl restart kodi
```

Click Submit to complete setup.

restart_timeout.title: Kodi Restart Timeout
restart_timeout.description:
The addon was installed and Kodi was restarted, but Kodi didn't respond in time.

This might just mean Kodi is taking longer to start. Please wait a moment and verify Kodi is running.

Click Submit to complete setup.

addon_not_detected.title: Addon Not Detected
addon_not_detected.description:
The addon files were installed and Kodi was restarted, but the addon wasn't detected.

This sometimes happens if Kodi needs another restart. Try restarting Kodi manually:
```
systemctl restart kodi
```

Click Submit to complete setup.

pipeline.title: Voice Assistant Pipeline
pipeline.description:
Select which Voice Assistant pipeline should route searches to this Kodi instance.

This is useful if you have multiple Kodi devices - each can be assigned to a different Voice Assistant profile.

Select "None" to make this the default Kodi for all unmatched pipelines.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to Kodi. Check the IP address, port, and credentials.
error.ssh_failed: SSH connection failed. Check the credentials and ensure SSH is enabled.
error.ssh_install_failed: Failed to install addon via SSH. Please install manually.

abort.already_configured: This Kodi instance is already configured.
abort.prerequisites_not_met: Voice assistant prerequisites not met. Please set up Whisper and Assist pipeline first.
